item.title: No. 9 Louisville Gets Past No. 23 Notre Dame 79-66 for 10th Straight Victory
item.description: Reyna Scott scored 20 points off the bench and No. 9 Louisville pulled away from No. 23 Notre Dame for its 10th straight victory, 79-66.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Dodgers Signing Kyle Tucker for $240 Million
